<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/crm/invoice/settings/terms"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Saves the default settings for the invoice terms specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"terms":{"description":"Invoice terms","type":"string"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Invoice settings","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"Autogenerated":{"type":"boolean","example":"true"},"Prefix":{"type":"string","example":"Prefix"},"Number":{"type":"string","example":"Number"},"Terms":{"type":"string","example":"Terms"},"CompanyName":{"type":"string","example":"CompanyName"},"CompanyLogoID":{"type":"integer","format":"int32","example":"123"},"CompanyAddress":{"type":"string","example":"CompanyAddress"}},"title":"InvoiceSetting"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
